channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A recent college grad asks: How do I compete with AI to get a job in finance?
item.description: For finance majors specifically, many of the tasks associated with entry-level jobs are being automated. But if you start seeing AI as a tool instead ...

item.title: ‘I’m tired of corporate America’: My wife and I have $1.65 million. I’m 61. Can I retire already?
I’m a senior who barely survives on $1,300 a month. No way could I live on $1,000.
item.description: “We seniors are pressured and scammed into buying a lot of things we don’t need.”

item.title: Stock market rally on hot CPI print is indicative of market strength, declares strategist Tom Lee
item.description: Tom Lee says it’s a sign of how robust the stock market is right now that gains came on a hotter-than-forecast core CPI report.

item.title: The biggest winners of the Taylor Swift-Travis Kelce podcast
item.description: After years of speculation, Taylor Swift will finally appear on Travis and Jason Kelce’s podcast “New Heights,” in an episode that is scheduled to be ...

item.title: Crypto exchange Bullish prices IPO at $37 per share, above expected range, ahead of NYSE debut
item.description: Crypto exchange Bullish priced its IPO at $37 per share, above its expected range, giving it a market value of over $5 billion.

item.title: 'Groundbreaking': Las Vegas Sphere says it's sold 120,000 tickets for 'Wizard of Oz' screenings
item.description: The company said it expects ticket sales to hit 200,000 by the time of the first screening.

item.title: What one investor is doing now that stock valuations are at their historical highs
item.description: The S&P 500's forward multiple sits at the high end of its 20 year historic range. Megacap tech stocks represent the bulk of the earnings growth.

item.title: Goldman sees this uranium stock surging as U.S. expands nuclear power, invests in critical resources
item.description: This domestic uranium miner is poised to benefit from the Trump administration's push to expand nuclear power and rebuild a domestic supply chain.

item.title: BlackRock’s Rick Rieder says CPI gives Fed justification for a half-point cut in September
item.description: "We expect the Fed to begin cutting rates in September, and it could be justified cutting the Funds rate by 50 basis points," Rick Rieder said.
